name: Cursed Harvest (Anthony G, Tanner Cobb, TheGreenster, Omar Dominguez, Justin Boremi)
name_original: Cursed Harvest (Anthony G, Tanner Cobb, TheGreenster, Omar Dominguez, Justin Boremi)
description: Living on a cursed farm might not seem the best place to continue your farming journey. You think you have what it takes to slowly plant crops. What about destroying exactly what you just planted. Those pumpkin seeds you planted over there, BOOM that is now a raging swarm of Goliath Pumpkins want you dead. Rack those points up, upgrade skills and strategize your farm to live till your a 100 year old farmer in his rocking chair overpowered as hell killing crops living the life in Cursed Harvest
